meaningMnemonic: Your <radical>fortune</radical> <radical>boil</radical>s down to a single <kanji>point</kanji> in time. One point in time determines how the rest of your future will go.
readingMnemonic: As you stare at the <kanji>point</kanji>, you watch in awe as it moves to the <reading>ten</reading> (てん) spot in a long series of numbers.
